publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-42 Marlyn Glen: Congratulations to Dundee’s Grove Academy—That the Parliament congratulates Dundee’s Grove Academy on its recent success in winning the English-Speaking Union Schools Mace; acknowledges that this is the first time a Scottish state school has won the prestigious event; hopes that this is the first of many victories for the school, and wishes it every success in the future.

S3M-42 Marlyn Glen: Congratulations to Dundee’s Grove Academy—That the Parliament congratulates Dundee’s Grove Academy on its recent success in winning the English-Speaking Union Schools Mace; acknowledges that this is the first time a Scottish state school has won the prestigious event; hopes that this is the first of many victories for the school, and wishes it every success in the future. Supported by: Karen Whitefield*, Iain Gray*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*, Cathy Peattie*, Sarah Boyack*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Kenneth Gibson*, Nanette Milne*, Alex Johnstone*, Robin Harper*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Trish Godman*, Karen Gillon*, Bill Butler*, Richard Baker*, Helen Eadie*, Hugh Henry*, Mary Mulligan*, Nigel Don*
S3M-42 Congratulations to Dundee’s Grove Academy (lodged on 22 May 2007) Alison McInnes*
S3M-42 Congratulations to Dundee’s Grove Academy (lodged on 22 May 2007) Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-42 Congratulations to Dundee’s Grove Academy (lodged on 22 May 2007) Alasdair Allan*
